00028 {
00029 public:
00030

00047     ~Transform() {}
00053     inline MatrixInitializer<double> operator=(const double &elementValue);
00064     inline ColumnVector<3,double> getTranslation() const;
00069     inline void getRollPitchYaw(double &roll, double &pitch, double &yaw) const;
00081     inline void getEulerAngles(double &theta, double &phi, double &xi) const;
00095 private:
00096 };
